title: Did President Trump Make These Pro-Life Remarks?
subtitle: A meme rearranged excerpts from President Donald Trump’s pre-taped remarks at the 46th annual March for Life in January 2019.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: President Donald Trump said: “I have signed a letter to Congress to make clear that if they send any legislation to my desk that weakens the protection of human life, I will issue a veto … Every child is a sacred gift from God … Every life is worth protecting … We know that every life has meaning and that every life is worth protecting.”
